dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think SpaceX is just about rockets, but actually it's a massive fundraising machine. An $850 million round just closed last week.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Billionaire Elon Musks rocket company SpaceX reportedly completed an $850 million fundraising round last week, as it looks to raise capital for its ambitious Starlink and Starship projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that brings their valuation to, uh, what was it, around $74 billion now? That's a huge jump from last year.
